Titus.1: Paul, a servant of God, to Titus. I left you in Crete to appoint elders. Deceivers must be silenced. To the impure nothing is pure.
Titus.2: Teach what is consistent with sound doctrine. Men are to be steadfast, women reverent. The grace of God trains us to live godly lives.
Titus.3: Show consideration to all. We were once slaves but God saved us. Believers should maintain good works. Everyone here sends greetings.
